name: Crossed Paths:Connected Worlds ~At First Sight~
description:
Claire is an unhappy teenager bouncing between school, home, and her uncertain future. However, she doesn't realize how hectic her life is until she finds a necklace that opens another world. Through this she meets Sophronia, another teenage girl trying to find her way through the world- or, worlds.

Crossed Paths:Connected Worlds ~ At First Sight ~ (shortened to Crossed:Worlds) is a remake of our very first visual novel being redone for Yuri Jam 2018- the script and all of the assets have been redone for this new version. It has one ending.

Art, Writing, and Programming:

Mikomi Kisomi
